https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8z7IptdlKjox7BIiwNwSdSV68HP.jpg A group of filmmakers are gathered in a dark and windy night for preparation of shooting a film based on a sensational murder case. It's unrealized that they are placed in the real crime scene and the true murderer is among them. Be Somebody
